headline: Minnesota GOP attorney general hopeful boasts staffers were Jan. 6 participants
author: Kate Scanlon
sentences:
But Rep. Elise Stefanik, the House Republican Conference's chairwoman, said the party had every right to take any action.?
Torgerson, a former criminal defense attorney in Minneapolis, made the comments at a forum last month for candidates in the GOP primary for attorney general.

"And so, I think in a lot of ways, the people at the Capitol on Jan. 6 were heroes and trying to preserve who was actually elected.?
The winner of the primary will likely face Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison, the Democratic incumbent, in November.

Lynne Torgerson, a Republican candidate for Minnesota attorney general, said at a recent candidate forum that at least two members of her staff participated in the events of Jan. 6 and described the people who stormed the Capitol as "heroes."
I guess, first, I should note that I have at least two people on my staff who were participants in Jan. 6,? Torgerson said at the event, hosted by the Chisago County Republican Party.
Later that day, as Congress met in a joint session to certify the results, rioters breached the Capitol complex, delaying the certification by several hours.
The Republican National Committee recently censured GOP Reps. Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger for their work on the House committee investigating the riot.
On Jan. 6, then-President Donald Trump addressed a rally near the White House, telling supporters the election was stolen, without evidence.
The remarks were circulated this week by Heartland Signal, a website tied to a progressive talk radio station in Chicago.
Torgerson said it seemed at that time? that President Joe Biden's election was somewhat of a coup."
The comments are a snapshot of wider fractures within the Republican Party over the day's events.
Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell criticized the move, as did several Senate Republicans.
Torgerson did not explain whether her staff participated in the rally, the riot, or both.
Truth is the person who won was President Trump,? Torgerson said.
